item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 6–14 June 2022 – Seating Plan Projection
item.description:
Seating plan projection for the Belgian Chamber
76 seats needed for a majority
Opinion poll by Ipsos for Het Laatste Nieuws, Le Soir, RTL TVi and VTM, 6–14 June 2022
Details on https://filipvanlaenen.github.io/belgian_polls/2022-06-14-Ipsos.html
